mapper.select: SELECT seq as seq, dnis as dnis, stime as stime, etime as etime, va_yn as va_yn, ment as ment, crt_dt as crt_dt, crt_by as crt_by, upt_dt as upt_dt, upt_by as upt_by FROM givr.ax_ivr_emerment_gr WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY stime asc, dnis asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO givr.ax_ivr_emerment_gr (seq, dnis, stime, etime, va_yn, ment, crt_dt, crt_by) VALUES (#{seq}, #{dnis}, #{stime}, #{etime}, #{va_yn}, #{ment}, #{crt_dt}, #{crt_by})
mapper.update: UPDATE givr.ax_ivr_emerment_gr SET dnis = #{dnis}, stime = #{stime}, etime = #{etime}, va_yn = #{va_yn}, ment = #{ment}, upt_dt = #{upt_dt}, upt_by = #{upt_by} WHERE seq = #{seq}
